# tmap: thematic maps in R

**tmap** is an R package for drawing thematic maps. The API is based on
[*A Layered Grammar of
Graphics*](https://vita.had.co.nz/papers/layered-grammar.pdf) and
resembles the syntax of
[**ggplot2**](https://cran.r-project.org/package=ggplot2), a popular
R-library for drawing charts.

## Installation

Installation of **tmap** is straightforward:

``` r
install.packages("tmap")
```

In case it fails, please check the dependencies below.

### Development version

The development version can be installed from the GitHub repository
using one of the following functions:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("r-tmap/tmap")

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("r-tmap/tmap")

# Or from r-universe
install.packages("tmap", repos = c("https://r-tmap.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
```

## Dependencies

tmap depend on other R packages, which will automatically be installed
along. However, two packages **sf** and **s2** have additional system
requirements: for Windows users, these are also installed along. For
Linux and MacOS users, these additional libraries may need to be
installed manually.

Instructions for the libraries GEOS, GDAL and PROJ (required by **sf**):
see the installation instructions of **terra** which requires the same
libraries:
[MacOS](https://rspatial.github.io/terra/index.html?q=installation#macos)
and
[Linux](https://rspatial.github.io/terra/index.html?q=installation#linux)

Instructions for the libraries Abseil and OpenSSL (required by **s2**):
see the [installation
instructions](https://r-spatial.github.io/s2/#installation).

## Getting started

Plot a World map of the happy planet index (HPI) per country. The object
`World` is an example spatial data (`sf`) object that is contained in
**tmap**:

``` r
tm_shape(World) +
    tm_polygons(fill = "HPI")
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-4-1.png)

This map can be enhanced in several ways. For instance:

``` r
tm_shape(World, crs = "+proj=robin") +
    tm_polygons(fill = "HPI",
                fill.scale = tm_scale_continuous(values = "matplotlib.rd_yl_bu"),
                fill.legend = tm_legend(title = "Happy Planet Index",
                                        orientation = "landscape", 
                                        frame = FALSE)
                )
```

![](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-5-1.png)

## Online tmap course

3-6 June, organized jointly by
[PRStats](https://www.prstats.org/course/visual-exploration-analysis-and-presentation-of-spatial-data-using-the-tmap-package-tmap01/)
and
[Instats](https://instats.org/seminar/spatial-data-analysis-and-visualization)

## Additional Resources for Learning **tmap**

For more in-depth learning on the **tmap** package, refer to the
following resources:

- **Book Chapter:** [Geocomputation with R](https://r.geocompx.org/)
  includes a chapter on [Making Maps with
  R](https://r.geocompx.org/adv-map), which covers **tmap**.  
- **Official Vignettes:** A collection of vignettes at
  [r-tmap.github.io](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/) covers
  both basic and advanced topics with examples.  
- **Work-in-Progress Book:** *Elegant and Informative Maps with tmap* is
  an upcoming book available at
  [tmap.geocompx.org](https://tmap.geocompx.org/).

These resources provide a solid foundation for working with **tmap** in
R.

# Package index

## Thematic Maps

- [`tmap`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap-package.md)
  [`tmap-package`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap-package.md)
  : Thematic Map Visualization

## Create a quick plot

- [`qtm()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/qtm.md) : Quick
  thematic map plot

## Stacking tmap elements

- [`` `+`( ``*`<tmap>`*`)`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap-element.md)
  : Stacking of tmap elements

## Specify spatial data

- [`tm_shape()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_shape.md) :
  Shape (spatial object) specification
- [`tm_crs()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_crs.md) : Set
  the map projection (CRS)

## Add data-driven map layers

- [`tm_polygons()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_polygons.md)
  [`tm_fill()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_polygons.md)
  [`tm_borders()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_polygons.md)
  [`opt_tm_polygons()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_polygons.md)
  : Map layer: polygons
- [`tm_lines()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_lines.md)
  [`opt_tm_lines()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_lines.md)
  : Map layer: lines
- [`tm_symbols()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`tm_dots()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`tm_bubbles()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`tm_squares()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`tm_markers()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`opt_tm_markers()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`opt_tm_symbols()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`opt_tm_dots()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`opt_tm_bubbles()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  [`opt_tm_squares()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_symbols.md)
  : Map layer: symbols
- [`tm_raster()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_raster.md)
  [`opt_tm_raster()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_raster.md)
  : Map layer: raster
- [`tm_text()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_text.md)
  [`tm_labels()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_text.md)
  [`tm_labels_highlighted()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_text.md)
  [`opt_tm_text()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_text.md)
  [`opt_tm_labels()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_text.md)
  : Map layer: text
- [`tm_iso()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_iso.md) : Map
  layer: iso (contour)
- [`tm_sf()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_sf.md)
  [`opt_tm_sf()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_sf.md) :
  Map layer: simple features

## Specify facets and animations

- [`tm_facets()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  [`tm_facets_grid()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  [`tm_facets_wrap()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  [`tm_facets_pagewise()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  [`tm_facets_stack()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  [`tm_facets_hstack()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  [`tm_facets_vstack()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  [`tm_facets_flip()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_facets.md)
  : Specify facets
- [`tm_animate_fast()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_animate.md)
  [`tm_animate()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_animate.md)
  : Specify an animation

## Add auxiliary map layers

- [`tm_basemap()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_basemap.md)
  [`tm_tiles()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_basemap.md)
  : Map layer: basemap / overlay tiles
- [`tm_rgb()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_rgb.md)
  [`tm_rgba()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_rgb.md)
  [`opt_tm_rgb()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_rgb.md) :
  Map layer: rgb images
- [`tm_graticules()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_grid.md)
  [`tm_grid()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_grid.md) :
  Coordinate grid / graticule lines

## Add map components

- [`tm_title()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_title.md)
  [`tm_title_in()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_title.md)
  [`tm_title_out()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_title.md)
  : Map component: title
- [`tm_credits()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_credits.md)
  : Map component: (credits) text
- [`tm_compass()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_compass.md)
  : Map component: compass
- [`tm_scalebar()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scalebar.md)
  : Map component: scale bar
- [`tm_logo()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_logo.md) :
  Map component: logo
- [`tm_minimap()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_minimap.md)
  : Map component: minimap
- [`tm_mouse_coordinates()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_mouse_coordinates.md)
  : Map component: mouse coordinates
- [`tm_xlab()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_xlab.md)
  [`tm_ylab()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_xlab.md) :
  Map: x and y labels
- [`tm_inset()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_inset.md) :
  Map component: inset maps and other objects

## Set scale for a visual variable

Always use those in this form `<vv>.scale = tm_scale*()`

- [`tm_scale()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale.md) :
  Scales: automatic scale
- [`tm_scale_asis()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_asis.md)
  : Scales: as is
- [`tm_scale_bivariate()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_bivariate.md)
  : Scales: bivariate scale
- [`tm_scale_ordinal()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_categorical.md)
  [`tm_scale_categorical()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_categorical.md)
  : Scales: categorical and ordinal scale
- [`tm_scale_continuous()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_continuous.md)
  [`tm_scale_continuous_log()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_continuous.md)
  [`tm_scale_continuous_log2()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_continuous.md)
  [`tm_scale_continuous_log10()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_continuous.md)
  [`tm_scale_continuous_log1p()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_continuous.md)
  [`tm_scale_continuous_sqrt()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_continuous.md)
  [`tm_scale_continuous_pseudo_log()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_continuous.md)
  : Scales: continuous scale
- [`tm_scale_discrete()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_discrete.md)
  : Scales: discrete scale
- [`tm_scale_intervals()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_intervals.md)
  : Scales: interval scale
- [`tm_scale_rank()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_rank.md)
  : Scales: rank scale
- [`tm_scale_rgb()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_rgb.md)
  [`tm_scale_rgba()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_scale_rgb.md)
  : Scales: RGB

## Set legend for a visual variable

Always use those in this form `<vv>.legend = tm_legend*()`

- [`tm_legend()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_legend.md)
  [`tm_legend_hide()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_legend.md)
  [`tm_legend_combine()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_legend.md)
  [`tm_legend_bivariate()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_legend.md)
  : Legend
- [`tm_add_legend()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_add_legend.md)
  : Map component: manual legend
- [`tm_place_legends_right()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_extra_innner_margin.md)
  [`tm_place_legends_left()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_extra_innner_margin.md)
  [`tm_place_legends_bottom()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_extra_innner_margin.md)
  [`tm_place_legends_top()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_extra_innner_margin.md)
  [`tm_place_legends_inside()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_extra_innner_margin.md)
  [`tm_extra_inner_margin()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_extra_innner_margin.md)
  : tmap layout: helper functions

## Set charts for a visual variable

Always use those in this form `<vv>.chart = tm_chart*()`

- [`tm_chart_histogram()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_chart.md)
  [`tm_chart_bar()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_chart.md)
  [`tm_chart_donut()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_chart.md)
  [`tm_chart_violin()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_chart.md)
  [`tm_chart_box()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_chart.md)
  [`tm_chart_none()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_chart.md)
  [`tm_chart_heatmap()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_chart.md)
  : Legend charts

## Configure legend and component position

- [`tm_pos()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_pos.md)
  [`tm_pos_in()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_pos.md)
  [`tm_pos_out()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_pos.md)
  [`tm_pos_on_top()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_pos.md)
  [`tm_pos_auto_out()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_pos.md)
  [`tm_pos_auto_in()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_pos.md)
  : Set the position of map components
- [`tm_components()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_components.md)
  : Group components

## Set layout options

- [`tm_style()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_layout.md)
  [`tm_layout()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_layout.md)
  : Layout options
- [`tm_options()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_options.md)
  : tmap options
- [`tm_view()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_view.md) :
  View mode options
- [`tm_group()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_group.md) :
  Layer group control
- [`tm_plot()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_plot.md) :
  Plot mode options

## Set options globally for tmap

- [`tm_check_fix()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_options.md)
  [`tmap_options()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_options.md)
  [`tmap_options_mode()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_options.md)
  [`tmap_options_diff()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_options.md)
  [`tmap_options_reset()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_options.md)
  [`tmap_options_save()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_options.md)
  : tmap options
- [`tmap_style()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_style.md)
  : Set or get the default tmap style
- [`tmap_style_catalogue()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_style_catalogue.md)
  [`tmap_style_catalog()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_style_catalogue.md)
  : Create a style catalogue
- [`tmap_mode()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_mode.md)
  [`ttm()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_mode.md)
  [`rtm()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_mode.md)
  [`ttmp()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_mode.md)
  [`rtmp()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_mode.md) : Set
  tmap mode to static plotting or interactive viewing
- [`tmap_devel_mode()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_devel_mode.md)
  : Set the development mode
- [`tmap_design_mode()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_design_mode.md)
  : Set the design mode

## Export a tmap object

- [`tmap_save()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_save.md)
  : Save tmap
- [`tmap_leaflet()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_leaflet.md)
  [`tmap_grob()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_leaflet.md)
  : Export tmap to the format of the used graphics mode

## Datasets included in tmap

- [`World`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/World.md) : World
  dataset
- [`World_rivers`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/World_rivers.md)
  : Spatial data of rivers
- [`land`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/land.md) : Spatial
  data of global land cover
- [`metro`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/metro.md) : Spatial
  data of metropolitan areas
- [`NLD_prov`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/Netherlands.md)
  [`NLD_muni`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/Netherlands.md)
  [`NLD_dist`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/Netherlands.md) :
  Netherlands datasets

## Use tmap in shiny

- [`renderTmap()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/renderTmap.md)
  [`tmapOutput()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/renderTmap.md)
  [`tmapProxy()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/renderTmap.md)
  [`tm_remove_layer()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/renderTmap.md)
  :

  Wrapper functions for using **tmap** in **shiny**

## Print a tmap object

- [`tmap_last()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_last.md)
  : Retrieve the last map to be modified or created
- [`print(`*`<tmap>`*`)`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/print.tmap.md)
  [`knit_print(`*`<tmap>`*`)`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/print.tmap.md)
  : Draw thematic map
- [`tmap_animation()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_animation.md)
  : Create animation
- [`tmap_arrange()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_arrange.md)
  [`knit_print(`*`<tmap_arrange>`*`)`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_arrange.md)
  [`print(`*`<tmap_arrange>`*`)`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_arrange.md)
  : Arrange small multiples in grid layout

## Helper functions

- [`tm_const()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_const.md) :
  tmap function to define a constant visual value
- [`tm_seq()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_seq.md) :
  Specify a numeric sequence
- [`tm_vars()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_vars.md) :
  tmap function to specify variables
- [`tm_label_format()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_label_format.md)
  : tmap function to specify labels
- [`tm_plot_order()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tm_plot_order.md)
  : Determine plotting order of features
- [`theme_ps()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/theme_ps.md) :
  ggplot2 theme for proportional symbols
- [`tmap_tip()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_tip.md) :
  Print a random tip to the console
- [`tmap_icons()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_icons.md)
  [`marker_icon()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_icons.md)
  : Specify icons
- [`.tmap_providers`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_providers.md)
  [`tmap_provider_credits()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_providers.md)
  [`tmap_providers()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_providers.md)
  : Get basemap tiles providers
- [`tmap_overview()`](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/reference/tmap_overview.md)
  : Overview of tmap layers

### All vignettes

- [tmap advanced:
  animations](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_animations.md):
- [tmap advanced: grouping of
  components](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_comp_group.md):
- [tmap advanced:
  extensions](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_extensions.md):
- [tmap advanced: ggplot2
  integration](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_ggplot2.md):
- [tmap advanced: layer groups (view mode
  only)](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_groups.md):
- [tmap advanced: inset maps and
  minimaps](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_inset_maps.md):
- [tmap advanced:
  legends](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_legends.md):
- [tmap advanced: margins and aspect
  ratio](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_margins.md):
- [tmap advanced: multiple visual
  variables](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_multivariate.md):
- [tmap advanced:
  options](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_options.md):
- [tmap advanced: positioning of
  components](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_positions.md):
- [tmap advanced:
  options](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/adv_shiny.md):
- [tmap basics:
  basemaps](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/basics_basemaps.md):
- [tmap basics:
  charts](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/basics_charts.md):
- [tmap basics:
  components](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/basics_components.md):
- [tmap basics:
  exporting](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/basics_exporting.md):
- [tmap basics:
  facets](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/articles/basics_facets.md):
